name: Demonic Statue of the Outer Path
title: Deity
shortDescription: Husk of the Ten-Tails used as a container for tailed-beast chakra; seeks to regain chakra.

name: Ten-Tails (Jūbi)
title: Deity of Deities
shortDescription: Combined form of Kaguya and the God Tree; progenitor of chakra.

name: Zero-Tails (Reibi)
title: Deity
shortDescription: Man-made bijū formed from dark thoughts; power scales with chakra/EXP.

name: One-Tail (Shukaku)
title: Deity
shortDescription: Tanuki-like bijū specialized in sand manipulation and sealing techniques.
